title: Dress code
content: Pes certainly has some dress codes. Do people follow them?

comments.body:
is this really adhered to?ðŸ˜­

cuz i recently bought a lot of printed tees and cargos and stuff. also wtf do they mean by "collarless tshirts prohibited"
Ye it's fine they are not strict at all

I've seen some invigilators tell people not to wear cargo pants during exams, obviously they don't do anything about it during the exam. Other than that, I've never seen anything about dress code being said
